name: SOURAYA London
slogan: SOURAYA is a dynamic and edgy Ready to Wear brand
description:
SOURAYA is a dynamic and edgy Ready to Wear brand that specializes in evening wear.

Our designs are inspired by couture and promise a high quality and a luxurious feel with accessible prices.

Our products are sold on our online and social media platforms and in our showrooms located in London, Paris and Beirut.

We like to think of SOURAYA not only as a brand but as a universe where couture and eccentricity meet and make themselves accessible to women all around the world.

Although we only launched in 2017, we have already dressed influencers and celebrities with more than 3 million Instagram followers as well as featured in international publications such as Vogue, Harper bazaar, Marie Claire, L’Officiel, Hello magazine and many more. 
We also had our first runway show during Paris Fashion Week 2019 in collaboration with Vogue.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description:
Position Overview
•	The successful candidate will be responsible for planning, implementing, monitoring and driving the digital strategy increase brand awareness and improve Marketing efforts as well as increase sales for Souraya 
•	You will manage and optimise all direct and indirect digital channels – website, Facebook, Instagram,Shopify, Pintrest and LinkedIn
•	Capturing moments of the founders/designer’s life, collections and events such as runway shows etc.
Essential Functions and Physical Requirements
•	We are looking for someone who is passionate about digital marketing and will drive this for Souraya 
•	Previous experience in a similar role, preferably in a similar fashion environment
•	You should be “plugged in” to latest trends in fashion 
•	Excellent attention to detail and creative as well as analytical thinking
•	Copywriting skills
•	Graphic design skills (Photoshop, Adobe Acrobat)
•	Solid experience in successful paid social media campaigns including use of Facebook Ad Manager and SEO
•	Excellent communication skills
•	Good eye for imagery and lifestyle/ campaign content creation
Job Type: Part-time
Experience:
•	Digital Fashion Marketing: 2 years (Preferred)
Flexible Working Options Available:
•	20 hours per week 

Detailed Day to day tasks:
•	Implementing a structured social media strategy 
•	Strategic Vision planning 
•	Content Management Systems (CMS)
•	WordPress
•	Analysing trends 
•	Research and recommend modern technologies, tools and channels to drive sales and increase brand awareness
•	Establish regular KPI (Key Performance Indicators) reporting and dashboards for SEO, PPC, display and affiliates.
Social Media Analytics
•	Generating creative approaches and reporting on most effective (Analytics, quantitative and qualitative data)  
•	Facebook pixel 
•	A/B testing different audiences in order to find out which performs best

Pushing sales through social media 
•	Boosted targeted posts to increase reach on announcements
•	Targeted and timed Instagram advertising to create brand awareness and sales globally
•	Specified geo location adverts through Facebook
•	Created targeted adverts through Facebook during peak times to increase traffic to the website 
•	Turning the Instagram page into a shoppable page 
•	Creative  “swipe up” promotions on Instastories 
•	Connecting with influencers and their community to create sales 
•	Optimizing content and technology (SEO) by Creating a user-friendly page easy to navigate and leading them to shop on our website as well as getting our website to be highly ranked in the Google’s search engine 
•	Keeping our Shopify platform up to date 
Creative eye:
•	Daily Instagram stories in combination with posts 
•	Content creation for the SOURAYA World feed
•	Creating digital SOURAYA signature looks 
•	Story telling 
•	Creating branded quotes that match the ethos of the brand 
•	Time-lapse, stop motion, GIFS to create movement and engaging content
•	Teasers of presentations or Trunk shows
•	Filming some behind the scenes and allowing the audience to part of the journey 
•	Creating content that resonates with the season calendar (Fashion week, Christmas, New Year etc. )
•	Writing skills, and beautifully curated images
•	Creating brand awareness 
•	Incorporate IGTV with backstage behind the scene with Souraya during fashion week 
•	Creating a compelling user-generated campaign (UGC) to interact with customers 
•	Posting all relevant press 
•	Community management by creating observing and engaging in conversations within the brand community 
•	Instagram live series 
•	Researching Popular and appropriate Hashtags to push the brands reach 
•	Creating a newsletter and using Mailchimp
